translation.en: "Magic isn't a permissible shortcut to hard work."

translation.ko: - 하지만 스승님! - 그렇게 토 달지 말랬지

translation.en: I'm just-- I know I'm capable of more than just pushing a broom.
translation.ko: 빗자루나 쓸고 있기엔 제가 너무 아깝다고요

translation.en: Teach me to be a proper sorcerer!
If there is a universal truth in this world,
it is that struggle is the flame which forges one's soul into steel.
translation.ko: 꾸준한 노력 없이는 아무것도 얻을 수 없다

translation.en: To take the easy way out is to merely exist, Hisirdoux.
translation.ko: 자고로 쉬운 길은 없는 법이다, 히서둑스

translation.en: So, why am I learning spells if I'm not supposed to use them?
translation.ko: 써먹지도 못할 주문은 뭐 하러 배워요?

translation.en: I wanna be a wizard like you!
Staffs are for those with mastery over magic,
translation.ko: 지팡이는 마법에 통달해야 휘두를 수 있고

translation.en: and magic is mastery over life.
translation.ko: 마법은 인생에 통달해야 구현할 수 있지

translation.en: So first, you must learn how to live.
Master that lesson, and I vow your days of pushing brooms will be over.
translation.ko: 여기서 깨달음을 얻으면 빗자루에서 해방해 주마

translation.en: "Magic isn't a permissible shortcut to hard work."
-'Night, Doux! Thanks for cleaning up! -Of course!
translation.ko: - 먼저 갈게, 청소 고마워 - 이 정도로 뭘!

translation.en: Right, time for the real work.

translation.ko: 이렇게 깔끔하게 잡은 건 또 처음이네!

translation.en: Aren't you a nasty little beast?
I figured an umber imp was the reason for all those lost pets.
translation.ko: 반려동물들이 없어지는 게 다 엄버 도깨비 때문 같더라니

translation.en: That is not an umber imp.
Do you notice the three mandibles?
How it's phasing in and out of existence?
And you should know your monsterology if you're going to use me as bait.
translation.ko: 날 미끼로 쓸 거면 그 정도 괴물학 지식은 기본이라고

translation.en: Either way, let's take a sec to recognize that I've--
we've done some very good magic tonight.
translation.ko: 우리가 오늘 마법을 잘 쓴 건 맞잖아

translation.en: -Douxie, old pal-- -No, no, no, revel in the victory.

translation.ko: 아무도 우릴 몰라주지만 그런데도 우린 묵묵하게

translation.en: keeping the world safe from specters and demons and--
It's out of the trap, isn't it?
[Archie] Your capture technique is still weak,
and you could use a couple more centuries of practice.
I will not be lectured by someone who licks their own butt!
translation.ko: 자기 엉덩이나 핥는 녀석의 설교는 사양이야!

translation.en: -[Archie] It's hygienic! -No, no, not this one.
Let's see you phase through this, you little git!
translation.ko: 어디 이것도 통과하나 보자 이 귀찮은 녀석!

translation.en: [chuckles] Got you-- This totally worked on that specterghast.
[Archie] Back in Babylon. That was a fun night. Heads up!
translation.ko: 바빌론에서나 먹혔지 그때 재밌긴 했어, 조심해!

translation.en: No, it had five heads. [grunts] Arch!
Uh… I've-- I've got it! I've got it! I've…
Also, unlike umber imps, mephits are vulnerable to fire.
translation.ko: 참, 엄버 도깨비와 달리 메핏은 불에 취약해

translation.en: -Say "hi" to everyone in limbo for me. -[squealing]
translation.ko: 림보에 가면 내 안부 인사도 전해 줘!

translation.en: Strange. A lone shadow mephit snacking on pets.
translation.ko: 희한한 일이야, 그림자 메핏이 혼자서 동물을 잡아먹다니

translation.en: Where there's one, there's usually more.
Finally, Arch! Our moment has arrived!
translation.ko: 드디어 그날이 왔어, 아치 때가 된 거야

translation.en: Hisirdoux, my faithful apprentice, I need--
You're darn right I've been faithful! I've been mopping for a millennium!
translation.ko: 맞아요, 제가 충직하긴 했죠 빗자루질만 1천 년을 했으니!

translation.en: Why didn't you send a raven or a text?
translation.ko: 스승님은 까마귀 전령이나 문자도 안 보냈고요!

translation.en: Well, I've been quite busy, too,
protecting the material plane while you weren't around.
translation.ko: 스승님이 자리를 비우신 동안 물질계를 지키느라요

translation.en: I've been practicing my incantations and my spells--

translation.ko: 그쯤 해 둬 지금은 시급한 일이 있다

translation.en: I need you to bring me the Guardians of Arcadia, with haste!
translation.ko: 아카디아의 수호자들을 내게 데려와, 지금 당장!

translation.en: Oh, it's our moment, all right, as errand boys.
translation.ko: 때가 되기는 했네 심부름이나 할 때

translation.en: Man, the rest of this summer's gonna eat farts.
translation.ko: 남은 여름 동안은 방귀나 뿡뿡대며 보내겠네

translation.en: Yeah, it is kind of hard to top destroying an alien god.
translation.ko: 응, 외계인 신과 싸운 걸 능가하긴 힘들겠지

translation.en: But I lost my butt-stomping, ninja-space-angel girlfriend
translation.ko: 하지만 난 내 닌자 발차기 우주 천사 여자 친구를 잃었는걸

translation.en: and my creepslaying partner in the same afternoon.
Yeah, I felt like that after Jim and Claire and everybody left on their quest--
translation.ko: 나도 짐과 클레어가 떠나고 그런 기분이었어, 임무를 위해...

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, whoa, we're talking about my problems here, buttsnack.
translation.ko: 아니, 잠깐만 지금 내 얘기 중이거든, 찐따야

translation.en: Beware. You, you are in grave danger.
translation.ko: 조심해라 너흰 심각한 위험에 처해 있다

translation.en: The cat just talked and you're focused on its eyewear?
translation.ko: 지금 고양이가 말을 하는데 안경이 대수야?

translation.en: I've seen aliens, creeps, and trolls, Domzalski.
So, yeah, I'd like to know why the talking cat's wearing glasses.
translation.ko: 말하는 고양이가 왜 안경을 썼나 궁금해할 수도 있지

translation.en: I'd remember if I met a cat with glasses.
translation.ko: 안경 쓴 고양이가 새엄마면 내가 기억했겠지!

translation.en: I am a wizard associate, thank you very much.
Now, come with me or the worst will come to pass.
translation.ko: 이제 날 따라와 최악의 사태가 벌어지기 전에

translation.en: Hey! Are you threatening me, pussycat?
Put simply, the world as you know it is about to end.
translation.ko: 간단히 말하자면 이 세계가 멸망하기 직전이거든

translation.en: Sorry, this is a lot to process!
Pets can talk? The world is ending? Again?
translation.ko: 고양이가 말을 하고 세계가 또 멸망해?

translation.en: Not the best timing, I know, but we need your help all the same.
translation.ko: 타이밍이 안 좋긴 하지만 아무래도 너희가 나서 줘야겠어

translation.en: I thought you worked at the cafe or were, like, a model or something.
translation.ko: 카페에서 일하는 거 아니었어? 모델인가 뭔가를 하지 않았나?

translation.en: [chuckles] There's a lot about me you don't know.
The answers to all your questions are within.
translation.ko: 너희가 궁금해하는 것들은 다 이 안에 있어
이게 다 뭐야? 책들이 막 날아다니네?

translation.en: Oh, my gosh! Oh, my gosh! Oh, my gosh! Oh, my gosh! Oh, my gosh!
Oh, my gosh! Oh, my gosh! Oh, my gosh!
So cool! So cool! So cool!
We haven't a moment to waste.
Though, I had hoped for more, Hisirdoux.
translation.ko: 네 능력이 이것밖에 안 되더냐, 히서둑스

translation.en: I tried. I couldn't find the changelings or the aliens.
translation.ko: 저도 나름 애썼지만 체인질링이나 외계인이 없었다고요

translation.en: I'm pretty sure most left the planet.
You know, War Hammer, Guardian of Arcadia, Geology Club president.
translation.ko: 번개망치, 아카디아의 수호자 지질학 동아리 회장 말이에요

translation.en: No one could forget you, chatty.
translation.ko: 너 같은 수다쟁인 쉽게 잊긴 힘들지

translation.en: -I have no idea who you are. -[Palchuk yelps]
[Merlin] But we're desperate. Thankfully, we have the brute.
I thought they were with you.
Make preparations. We've a journey ahead.
translation.ko: 일단은 여행 준비가 먼저야 곧 떠날 테니까

translation.en: But… are you sure you want to count on these children?
-They're clearly not ready for this. -[scoffs] Excuse me, college dude,
translation.ko: 아직 준비도 안 된 애들인데요? 대학생이라고 유세 떠나 본데

translation.en: these children fought off a 50-foot extraterrestrial! [screams]
Dude, let go of its head!
-[Palchuk] It's got my head, too, man! -Just put it back!
I mean, silence, all of you.
-Hisirdoux, did you lead them here? -No, no!
-I mean, I don't think so? [chuckles] -Yes, we did.
translation.ko: - 아마 아닐걸요? - 우리가 유인한 거 맞아

translation.en: He found us. The barrier won't hold for long.
translation.ko: 우릴 찾았어 장벽이 오래가진 않을 거다

translation.en: We must make egress! Tobias, take my things!
translation.ko: 당장 이곳을 뜨자꾸나 토비, 내 물건 잘 챙겨라

translation.en: All of you, to the roof!
Hisirdoux, I said get to safety.
Still trying to earn that staff, are you?
Yeah. I've learned a thing or two since we last met.
translation.ko: 당연하죠, 저도 이제 예전의 제가 아니에요

translation.en: -[Archie] I'm fine. No need to worry. -[grunts]
-But mephits are vulnerable to fire-- -Move it!
Excuse me, I have a question. How is this castle flying right now?
translation.ko: 뭐 하나만 물어봐도 돼요? 어떻게 하늘에 성이 둥둥 떠 있어요?

translation.en: Its magic keeps Camelot aloft, powered by time itself.
translation.ko: 심장의 마법은 성을 띄우고 시간 속에서 힘을 충전하지

translation.en: Sir Galahad, how look the skies?
[Merlin] Keep your eyes on the horizon.
I say, coming in a little hot, don't you think?
It's been 900 years since I was last here.
Give or take a few centuries.
[Palchuk] So, how many things can your cat turn into?
translation.ko: 저 고양이는 대체 얼마나 더 변신할 수 있어?

translation.en: [Douxie] That depends. How many things are there?
translation.ko: 글쎄, 못 하는 걸 세는 게 더 빠를걸

translation.en: but what's the grave danger you keep talking about?
Whoa, hey, Steve's here, too! How 'bout-- how 'bout some love for Steve?
translation.ko: 스티브도 있다는 걸 잊지 말라고! 나도 좀 반겨 주지?

translation.en: An unstoppable knight clad in green…
Master, is that the same knight we saw at the bookstore?
That onyx shard is working its way towards his heart.
translation.ko: 오닉스 파편이 짐의 심장을 향하고 있어서

translation.en: I placed the boy in stasis, stalling its progress… for now.
translation.ko: 시간이라도 끌 요량으로 임시방편차 이렇게 뒀다

translation.en: If I had my Shadow Staff, I could've saved him.
translation.ko: 내 포털 창만 있었어도 짐을 구할 수 있었는데

translation.en: Who is this Green Knight? How do I get my hands on him?
translation.ko: 대체 그 녹색 기사가 누군데요? 어떻게 하면 잡을 수 있죠?

translation.en: The Green Knight said but one name, which chilled me to the bone.
translation.ko: 녹색 기사가 내뱉은 이름은 날 뼛속까지 얼어붙게 했지

translation.en: Wait, I thought we kicked her bee witch butt to the Shadow Realm.
translation.ko: 그 여자는 우리가 그림자 왕국으로 보냈잖아요

translation.en: Which he appeared not to know, but he bore the emblem of Camelot.
translation.ko: 녹색 기사는 모르는 눈치였다 게다가 카멜롯의 상징도 지녔더군

translation.en: Come with me, quickly. I fear the answer lies in the past.
translation.ko: 지체할 시간이 없다 답은 과거에 있을 거야

translation.en: one even I cannot face alone.
translation.ko: 나 혼자서는 감당할 수도 없는 존재야

translation.en: You are all now soldiers in a war started centuries ago
translation.ko: 너희는 이제 수 세기 전 마법의 세계에서 시작된

translation.en: Once, the realms of Magic and Man clashed in endless bloodshed.
translation.ko: 한때 마법과 인간의 왕국이 끝없이 충돌하자

translation.en: King Arthur sought to wipe out magic that ravaged the lands
I brought what few spellcasters I could under my protection
translation.ko: 그때 도제 몇 명을 데려와 내 보호 아래에 두고

translation.en: to spare them from the sword…
She was the finest student I ever taught…
translation.ko: 모르가나는 내가 가르친 도제 중 가장 뛰어났지만

translation.en: until she tried to kill me.
Thankfully, in my all-seeing wisdom, I created a secret weapon--
translation.ko: 다행히 모든 걸 내다본 나는 비밀 무기를 만들었고

translation.en: The war came to a standstill
and I imprisoned Morgana at the Battle of Killahead Bridge.
translation.ko: 나는 죽음의 다리 전투에서 모르가나를 가두는 데 성공했지

translation.en: [Merlin] This Green Knight that assailed us -was clearly born of dark magicks… -[gasps]
translation.ko: 우리를 노린 녹색 기사는 어둠의 마법에서 기인했을 텐데

translation.en: …but I have no memory of him
translation.ko: 내 기억 속에는 존재하지 않는 자고

translation.en: nor what connection he could have to Morgana.
translation.ko: 모르가나와 어떤 연관이 있는지도 알 수 없어

translation.en: We know not what he is nor why he pursues us.
translation.ko: 녀석의 정체는 물론 우릴 쫓는 이유도 알지 못하지

translation.en: Though, his presence is a dire omen of things to come. -[bell ringing] -[all gasp]
translation.ko: 그럼에도 그자의 존재 자체가 위협이 되는 것만은 사실이다

translation.en: -What's happening? -Have you never been under attack before?
translation.ko: - 무슨 일이죠? - 공격 처음 당해 봐?

translation.en: [automated voice] I'm sorry, I couldn't find "bagel mints." Battlements!
I think we have something of a problem.
[Douxie] I'm on it! [grunts] I've got it, I've got it, I've got it.
-Steer us clear at my command! -[Douxie] I'm on it!
All of a sudden, flying castles aren't so cool!
translation.ko: 지금 보니까 하늘을 나는 성도 별로네!

translation.en: -Have you found the staff? -[Archie] I'm on it!
These foes' powers are beyond us!
I will take us to the past, but you must help me.
translation.ko: 함께 과거로 가려면 네가 도와줘야 한다

translation.en: I will do what I can.
-Feel the wrath of the hammer! -[Claire yelling]
Where's the staff? Where's the staff?
Archie, find the staff or we are all dead meat!
translation.ko: 아치, 어서 지팡이를 찾아 이러다 다 같이 저승길 가겠어!

translation.en: [Archie] What do you people think I'm doing?
Archie, I'm running out of time, here!
Please don't blow us up. Please don't blow us up.
We don't have enough power for the jump!
[grunts] We have to steer Camelot through the time rift!
translation.ko: 시간의 균열 속으로 카멜롯을 몰고 가야 해!

translation.en: Curses, Hisirdoux, you were supposed to steer us to safety!
translation.ko: 히서둑스 녀석, 안전한 곳으로 우릴 데리고 가랬더니!

translation.en: Must I always do everything myself?
translation.ko: 내가 직접 나서지 않으면 되는 게 없군

translation.en: They fell right through the portal.
I fear it's not a question of where, but rather when.
translation.ko: 지금은 어디로 갔는지보다 언제로 갔는지가 문제야

translation.en: Well, I just conjured an anti-gravity spell
to slow our fall and keep us from dying.
translation.ko: 떨어지는 속도를 늦췄고 덕분에 이렇게들 살았지

translation.en: Douxie, where is the flying castle?
translation.ko: 둑스, 하늘을 나는 성이 안 보이는데?

translation.en: Well, it would appear we've had ourselves a temporal accident.
translation.ko: 저기, 내가 보기엔 시간이 좀 꼬인 것 같아

translation.en: [man 3] What manner of sorcery is this?
